nuisance.translation[0].definitions[0].d: a person, thing, or situation that annoys you or causes problems
nuisance.translation[0].definitions[0].e: Stop making a nuisance of yourself  (=annoying other people with your behaviour)!
It’s a nuisance having to get up that early on a Sunday morning.
The dogs next door are a real nuisance.
What a nuisance! I’ve forgotten my ticket.
I hate to be a nuisance, but could you move your car to the other side of the street?
I hate to be a nuisance .../Sorry to be a nuisance ...
nuisance.translation[0].definitions[1].d: the use of a place or property in a way that causes public annoyance
nuisance.translation[0].definitions[1].e: The nightclub has been declared a public nuisance.
nuisance.translation[1].definitions[0].d: someone or something that causes public annoyance
nuisance.translation[1].definitions[0].e: After a local jury found the noise was a nuisance, a judge ruled that the bell can no longer ring at night.
movement of vehicles creating public nuisance
